venue.address_2: Bay Colony Corporate Center, North Entrance
venue.name: Emerging Enterprise Center at Foley Hoag

item.description:
Hi All,
We're back after a small break with a new, upscale location! ... There have been a few topic suggestions made in the last few weeks which lead to the below Agenda. Come see Boston's sharpest Cloud minds get together in August

1. Erik Sebesta, Founder and Architect at cloudTP will give a talk on:
In 2010, should you care about cloud computing?
Can you get quick wins?
Can you mitigate risks?

...and yes, we discuss real areas where companies are gaining
business advantage from cloud solutions.

2. Ron Zalkind, Co-Founder at Aprigo will give a talk about Aprigo NINJA for Google Docs, a Google Market Place app. With many organizations adopting Google Apps and Google Docs, today, they have very little visibility and control on how those documents being used:
- Who has access to what
- What is accessible to who
- What documents are shared outside the company
- More

group.name: Boston Cloud Services - All things Cloud, SaaS, PaaS, XaaS

item.name: Boston Cloud Services Summer Meetup
